Name: Easy A
Title: Easy A
Desc: The escape of a little white lie teaches a clean-cut teen to use the rumor mill for personal gain.
LongDescription: Prompted by her popular best friend to spill details of her boring weekend, Olive, a clean-cut teen, decides to spice things up by telling a little lie about losing her virginity; when the high-school busybody overhears the conversation and spreads it all over campus, Olive is suddenly notorious but for the wrong reasons.
